Articles.Content:
Hi, after im done building my ship and i go to launch it lags really bad on the launch pad and everywhere pretty much. Im on 64 bit with lots of mods and this started happening recently for some reason.

Specs:

CPU:AMD FX 6300 6 core processor

Video Card: GTX 650

RAM: 8 GB

Windows 7 64 bit

Thanks in advance!

This should go here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/77-Support-%28modded-installs%29

How many parts does the rocket have? What mods are you using?

Any kind of log? Test results when it lags and when it doesn't? When it started to lag and if 32bit lags?

....anything?

I had this happen before and it was due to the number of parts I was using. I actually had a craft that was rather small(ish) and used 500+ parts and mostly structural walls and the settling of the craft crashed the game while in 64 bit. I dropped down to 32 Bit and used Active Texture Manager and lessened my crashes even over 1k parts. It still crashes, but not as much. I would lean to the number of parts. There was a welding mod, but I have not tried it yet. Supposedly makes the game treat parts as one. Less parts to process. I dunno...I like that challenge to manage. If you have a second screen, open up Task Manager and take a peek at your RAM usage for KSP when it occurs.

Does it occur with crafts with less parts or does it not seem to matter?
